summary: Successfully implemented streamlined Telegram integration for UwU-CLI based on ChatGPT's analysis. Added 17 enhanced quick commands, multi-shell routing (cmd:, ps1:, bash:, cs:), research modes (deep:, review:, audit:), infinite mode system, and enhanced Telegram command handler. All features tested and working correctly with 5/5 tests passing. The system now provides professional shell experience with short, efficient commands that make Telegram integration much more user-friendly.
current_status: UwU-CLI enhanced with streamlined Telegram integration, multi-shell support, research modes, and infinite mode system. All new features implemented, tested, and documented. Ready for production use with significantly improved user experience for Telegram-based development control.
